page.title: 16CARAVAN SITES AND HOUSING.
page.content: {Wythall Residential Caravan Site}is run by Bromsgrove Council.On 7 acres stand 98 privately owned mobile homes.Each plot has a brick built toilet and bathroom with shower and is connected to essential services.The site is up for sale as it stands and will remain a mobile homes park.{ {Mobile Homes Park.}On about 4 acres stand 70 homes.Maintenance and main services are supplied for rent,which differs according to size of plot. Homes are bought by residents and erected on site. Most residents are retired people.The manager hopes to expand the site. Other housing in this block is mainly farms and cottages grouped along country lanes and the main Alcester Road. {SILVERMEAD. }
